allow:
Bash(# Configure AWS CLI to not require interactive confirmation
export AWS_PAGER=""
mkdir -p ~/.aws
cat > ~/.aws/config << 'EOF'
[default]
region = us-east-1
output = json
cli_pager = 
EOF)

Bash(# Source credentials and export them
source ~/.iseetutor-credentials 2>/dev/null || true
env | grep -E "AWS_|OPENAI_|GOOGLE_|PINECONE_" | head -10)

Bash(# Export AWS credentials
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID="AKIAVWQU5XTF54YG2JXJ"
export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY="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"
export AWS_DEFAULT_REGION="us-east-1"

# Verify AWS credentials
aws sts get-caller-identity)

Bash(# Fix AWS config
rm -f ~/.aws/config
mkdir -p ~/.aws
echo "[default]" > ~/.aws/config
echo "region = us-east-1" >> ~/.aws/config
echo "output = json" >> ~/.aws/config

# Test again
aws sts get-caller-identity)
